about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hello everybody
about.p-1: With an innate talent for unique and challenging problem solving, handled with an unmatched creativity.
about.p-2: Peruvian Web developer, making interactive and elegant designs. Prioritizing the user experience in each project
about.p-3: As a web developer passionate about design and user experience, I specialize in front-end development, creating new concepts to show a unique identity in my work.
about.p-4: When I'm not in front of the computer I'm playing piano, guitar, soccer or dancing Marinera (Peruvian dance).

skills.title: Updated with industry standard technologies
skills.subtitle: Always learning something new
skills.quote: Don't be upset when people reject you. Nice things are rejected all the time by people who can't afford them.

footer.title: START A PROJECT
footer.p: Just feel free to contact if you wanna collaborate with me or simply have a conversation.
